title: Electricity: generation and distribution
brief_description: Episode 6 of the series “Is this job for me” on the electricity supply industry. The jobs in the industry are shown by tracing the apprenticeships of two boys who went to the same school; one who enters the generating side and the other the distribution side of industry.
